aboutpara:
Hi, I'm Issyah Ismail‚Äîa UI/UX Front-End Developer based in Singapore. I‚Äôve been crafting digital experiences at SendForensics for the past 10 years, blending clean design with performant, maintainable code.

I specialize in building responsive, intuitive interfaces using:

- React & Next.js ‚Äì for fast, modern web apps
- Tailwind CSS & Material UI ‚Äì to create scalable, consistent design systems
- Shopify Liquid ‚Äì customizing powerful e-commerce storefronts
- UI/UX Design ‚Äì focusing on clarity, usability, and simplicity
- Data Visualization ‚Äì translating complexity into clarity

I care deeply about the little things‚Äîmaking sure every interaction feels right, every layout is responsive, and every product feels like it was built with intention.

When I‚Äôm not writing code, I‚Äôm probably immersed in Warhammer 40K lore or gearing up for a Space Marine 2 session. I also enjoy 80s Synthwave, indie side projects, and helping small brands bring their ideas to life online.

Want to work together or just talk shop (or boltguns)? Let‚Äôs connect.
